comments:
Details:
Parameter in library explorer can not drop to layout

Step:
1.New a library and new a parameter named "p1"
2.Open a report design and include a library
3.Drop the p1 from library explorer to layout and preview

Actual result:
An error message pop up.

If the user drag the paramter from library to the design layout, the designer creates a data item which use the paramter as the expression. 

The process should be:

1) create a paramter which extends from the paramter of libraries
2) create a data item in the report design. 
3) set the data item's expression to the new paramter defined in the design.

The acutal result is the data item use the paramter in the library as its expression instead of the paramter in the report design.
Create the date item as the Wei suggested.
The Parameter can drop from library explorer to layout. But cannot be used.

Invalid, see the attachment. The paramter defined in the library is "paramter". The paramter defined in the report design which extends the "paramter" is "New Paramter", the created data item's expression is params["paramter"] instead of the params["New Paramter"].

Create the date item as the Wei suggested.
Uses the local parameter name.
